content:
Yes! Depending on where you're coming from, you can take any of the subway lines of the Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority (MBTA), also known as the T. The closest T stops to the Boston Common are:

- Park Street Station: Served by the Red and Green Lines. It is located right at the edge of the Boston Common, making it the most convenient stop for the park. - Boylston Station: Served by the Green Line. It is also located close to the park, on the other side of the Common. - Arlington Station: Served by the Green Line. It is located a few blocks away from the Common, towards the Back Bay area. All three stations are within a 5-10 minute walk to the Boston Common.
